author: Tara Guzman
title: Photographers are Capturing Families in Quarantine on their Front Steps, and It’s the Best Thing to Come from Social Distancing
description: This past week has been a trying time for all of us as we figure out how to go from living our normal lives to being told to stay at home to keep everyone as healthy as possible. While it’s been hard, there have been so many great things that have come out of…
